name: Joined Together (PixelatedPasty)
description:
My first game and entry for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

The theme for the jam is 'Joined Together' and players control both Blip and Blop with one set of controls.  Feel free to use WASD or the arrow keys, with Space to jump.  Have fun and feel free to leave me some feedback.

If you have problems playing in the browser, you can get the direct download here.
